column7: This is the second time I stayed at this hotel because my first experience of staying there 2 years back was excellent. The hotel has very good facilities and the staff is very accommodative and helpful. The breakfast spread is very wide and tasty. I did not make use of the swimming pool and the gym. The hotel is located on a one-way street which is quite busy and noisy but one does not hear the noise in the rooms.
